HeroSlider.slide_2_text: Punctuality and reliability. You can be sure that production and delivery will be completed on the agreed time.
HeroSlider.slide_3_title: We create products that make life easier
HeroSlider.slide_3_text: We can bring any of your ideas to life!

About.title: About Company
About.subtitle: We create innovative solutions from foam
About.description: Our factory is one of the leading manufacturers of foam products in the region. For over 10 years, we have been creating products that are used in construction, packaging, decor, and other fields. Our goal is to provide customers with high-quality, environmentally safe, and durable solutions.

About2.company_description: Since 2014, INTRO FACADE has been a trusted expert in the foam production industry. For each client looking to bring diversity into their life using highly aesthetic foam products for homes, office spaces, commercial areas, or gardens, INTRO FACADE is ready to become a reliable partner and friend.

ServiceSection2.description1: An effective solution for pipe insulation, providing thermal insulation and reducing heat loss.
ServiceSection2.description_big1: A reliable solution for pipe insulation. A lightweight, eco-friendly material that prevents water from freezing in pipes during winter and minimizes heat loss in heating systems. Ideal for use in residential and industrial buildings, protecting utilities and extending their service life.
ServiceSection2.description2: Strong and lightweight packaging for reliable protection of goods during transportation and storage.
ServiceSection2.description_big2: A modern solution for the safe transportation and storage of goods. Foam packaging is highly durable and lightweight, protecting products from shocks, vibrations, and damage. Perfect for electronics, furniture, glass, and other fragile items. Easy to recycle, making it an environmentally friendly choice.
ServiceSection2.description3: The ideal material for installing underfloor heating systems, ensuring even heat distribution.
ServiceSection2.description_big3: An essential element in modern underfloor heating systems. Foam insulation ensures effective heat retention, uniform temperature distribution across the surface, and reduces heat loss. Easy to install and resistant to moisture, it creates comfort and warmth in your home.
ServiceSection2.description4: A wide range of foam products for decorative and construction purposes with high durability.
ServiceSection2.description_big4: A broad selection of foam products for decorative and construction applications. Lightweight, strong, and resistant to external factors, they are ideal for various tasks: from creating packaging to producing complex architectural elements. Custom manufacturing options are available.
ServiceSection2.description5: An elegant and practical solution for decorating building facades.
ServiceSection2.description_big5: A stylish and functional solution for decorating building facades. Lightweight and durable foam elements such as cornices, moldings, and columns add character to the building and enhance its aesthetic value. Weather-resistant and easy to install, they ensure long-lasting durability and a luxurious appearance.

HistorySection.title: Company history, present, and future
HistorySection.description:
14 years ago, when we offered clients facade decor that was 5 times cheaper in price and faster to produce than gypsum and polyurethane decorations, they doubted that it was possible.

We were among the first to introduce the new construction technology of facade decor using foam elements, which are applied in Canada and the USA. By launching a production line for the production of polystyrene products, we execute any design solutions that are significantly cheaper for the client compared to alternatives made from other materials, more durable in use, and faster to produce.

products_facade_finish.title: Facade finishing with foam panels
products_facade_finish.text1: For insulation and decoration of houses
products_facade_finish.text2: If you need to simultaneously decorate and insulate the facade of your house, facade panels are an excellent solution for this task.
products_facade_finish.text3: Polyfacade is manufactured using a technology that bonds two layers (insulation and protective layer) into a single panel. This technology extends the lifespan of the panels and reduces their cost without compromising quality.

montaj.title: Installation
montaj.subtitle: Installation by
montaj.description: The Intro Facade team performs supervision of the drainage system installation, facade panel installation, polyfacade, facade decor, polyurethane foam insulation, and polyurea waterproofing.

testimonials.subtitle: What Our Clients Say's
testimonials.Des1: We ordered the supervision of the drainage system installation for our country house. The work was done at the highest level! The team installed it quickly, taking all our wishes into account. Highly recommend!
testimonials.Des2: Very satisfied. The house has transformed: the appearance became modern, and the thermal insulation improved significantly. Thank you for paying attention to details and for the neat work!
testimonials.Des3: We contacted them regarding polyurethane foam insulation. The house immediately became noticeably warmer, and heating bills decreased. The process was quick and clean. They use modern equipment and did everything perfectly. Will recommend!
testimonials.Des4: We ordered facade decor for our country house. The work was done with perfect precision! The house now looks like a real masterpiece. Thank you for the quality result and quick installation.

promotions.title1: Sets of Facade Decorations with a 5% Discount
promotions.description1: Order a set of facade decorations from our catalog and get a 5% discount on the entire order.
promotions.title2: Refer a Friend and Get a 3% Discount
promotions.description2: Place separate orders together with a friend, relative, or neighbor and get a 3% discount on your order. It is not necessary to order the same product.
promotions.description3: We are selling all remaining stock.
